mapper.select: SELECT b.B_NO num, b.B_TITLE title, b.M_ID writer, b.B_CONTENT content, f.B_FILENAME filName, b.B_STATUS, b.B_CREATEDATE, b.B_MODIFYDATE FROM ACTI_BOARD b LEFT JOIN ACTI_FILE f on f.B_NO = b.B_NO ORDER BY b.B_NO DESC;

SELECT b.B_NO num, b.B_TITLE title, b.M_ID writer, b.B_CONTENT content, f.B_FILENAME filName, b.B_STATUS, b.B_CREATEDATE, b.B_MODIFYDATE FROM ACTI_BOARD b LEFT JOIN ACTI_FILE f on f.B_NO = b.B_NO ORDER BY b.B_NO DESC LIMIT 5;
